actions.name: Type Harmony
actions.description: You emit a 10m aura which gives creatures that share a type with you +10% Damage output. This aura costs 2PP to activate, plus a further 2PP per round to maintain, spent on your first activation of the round.

system.description: You emit a 10m aura which gives creatures that share a type with you +10% Damage output. This aura costs 2PP to activate, plus a further 2PP per round to maintain, spent on your first activation of the round. This Perk requires a Complex Action to activate but can be maintained as a Free Action.
